## Biography

Hello everyone! I am Bo Li, a bioinformatician and associated professor in Chongqing Normal University of China. Before coming to Chongqing, I was a teacher at Wuhan Bioengineering Institute, mainly teaching molecular biology and cell biology.

## Education

**Chongqing University of China** | Ph.D. in Bioinformatics | Sep. 2013 - Jun. 2017

**Chongqing University of China** | M.S. in Biophysics | Sep. 2010 - May 2013

**Northwest A&F University of China** | B.S. in Bioengineering | Sep. 1999 - Jul. 2003

## Experience

**Chongqing Normal University** | Principle Investigator (AP) | January 2020 - Present

**Chongqing Normal University** | lecturer | July 2017 - June 2019

**Wuhan Bioengineering Institute** | Faculty Member | July 2004 - June 2010

**Academy of Military Medical Sciences** | lab technician | July 2003 - May 2004

## Research Interest

**Machine learning methodology in biomedicine**

**Developing bioinformatics database & software**

**AI and drug discovery**

**Educational data mining in biology teaching**
